allow:
Bash(survival and competing risk modelling".

Key additions:
- Competing risks module \(src/competing_risks/\) with:
  - Cause-specific Cox model wrapper
  - Discrete-time Fine-Gray implementation
  - Random Survival Forest for competing risks
  - Time-dependent concordance index at 24, 48, 72 months
  - Aalen-Johansen CIF estimation

- Analysis notebooks:
  - 02: scikit-survival exploration
  - 03: Data preparation \(original and Blumenstock-style\)
  - 04: Non-parametric CIF estimation
  - 05: Cause-specific Cox models
  - 06: Fine-Gray subdistribution hazard model
  - 07-08: Model comparison experiments \(4.1, 4.2, 4.3\)

- FRED macroeconomic data download script
- Reference papers \(Blumenstock 2022, Fine & Gray 1999\)

Dataset 2 period: 2010-2025 \(extended from paper''s 2010-2017\)
Variables: 9 loan-level + 13 macroeconomic features
Evaluation: C-index at 24, 48, 72 months for prepay \(k=1\) and default \(k=2\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
